amendment.description: To transfer funding to the Special Diabetes Program for Indians and the Alcohol and Substance Abuse Program within the Indian Health Service from funding for federal land acquisition.

action.text: Amendment SA 1019 proposed by Senator Burns for Senator Coburn.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1019.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1019 made in Senate.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1019 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 17 - 75. Record Vote Number: 159.
Amendment SA 1019 ruled out of order by the chair.
